description.value:
Using a thrall as a vessel, you attempt to drain the essence of a creature and use it for yourself. The target thrall Strides up to 30 feet, then one creature of your choice adjacent to it must attempt a Fortitude saving throw. The targeted thrall is then destroyed.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, but recovers after 1 minute. You or an ally of your choice within 30 feet of the thrall regain Hit Points equal to the amount the creature lost by becoming drained.

Failure As success, but @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}.

Critical Failure As success, but @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3}.
